definition: to be captivated/to wonder/enchanting
old variant of 魂[hun2]
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
variant of 繞|绕[rao4], to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex

sentences.english: The captivating home is the place we are craving for.
sentences.chinese: 魂牵梦绕的故乡，心中渴望的圣地。

sentences.english: Yi's charm has always dreamed play many scholars.
sentences.chinese: 彝剧的魅力一直都魂牵梦绕着许多学者。

sentences.english: Life after life; the cycle of past and future repeats.
sentences.chinese: 芸芸众生，魂牵梦绕的无非过去和未来。

sentences.english: I am really crazy about English, just like you are obsessed by Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我为英语而痴狂，就想你为汉语所魂牵梦绕一样。

sentences.english: I can finally see it cherished the moon cake was.
sentences.chinese: 我终于可以看到那魂牵梦绕的月饼了。

sentences.english: Which haunted, and haunted her day and night.
sentences.chinese: 让她日日夜夜，魂牵梦绕。

sentences.english: A single pieces of memory has make me dream of chain of nightmares.
sentences.chinese: 一种支离破碎的回忆也能让我魂牵梦绕。

sentences.english: Men always remember a woman who caused them concern and uneasiness.
sentences.chinese: 男人总是只记得那个一直令他魂牵梦绕的女人。

sentences.english: Ever of you I'm fondly dreaming.
The girl who dreamed could still recall that when she looks like.
sentences.chinese: 曾经魂牵梦绕的姑娘，可还曾记得她的模样。

sentences.english: Lara would never part with the Scion; she's far too obsessed with it.
sentences.chinese: 劳拉不会舍弃司祭盎，这是她魂牵梦绕的东西。

definition: to miss/to yearn day and night
to yearn for sth day and night (idiom)
one's thoughts fly to a longed-for place or person/to long for/infatuated/fascinated
deeply worried (idiom); to feel anxious
to linger/to remain enjoying oneself and forget to go home
to keep in mind constantly (idiom)
to miss/to long for
home/homeland/native place/CL:個|个[ge4]
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
enchanted/fascinated/charmed
to think fondly of
ecstatic/enraptured
to be fascinated/to be rapt/to long for/to dream of
to dream/to sleep
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
true love
